DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are studying the clinical worth of the serum markers S-100B and NSE in patients with spinal cord injuries e.g. in patients with vertebral fractures. If there is a injury to the neuronal structures these two proteins could be secreted into the serum and add evidence to the severity of the injury.
DOC.brief_title: S-100B and Neuron-specific Enolase (NSE) in Spinal Trauma
DOC.criteria: vertebral fracture injuries to the vertebral spine head trauma polytrauma
